name: Rio's Adventure
description:
After being kidnapped the dog Rio and his owner woke up in unknown location. 

They split up and try to see where they are.  After exploring the surroundings, Rio returns to the place where they parted and realizes that his owner is gone. He immediately goes in search of him, remembering well what he told him last......

The road is getting longer and Rio is getting hungrier and hungrier. He must find some food along the way in order to continue. Most of the health gives him a juicy steak and the chicken is just to give him some strength.

Along the way, he must find things that his owner left him as guidelines. 

But along the way he has to do a good deed for his canine friends, which by a lucky circumstance brings him to the place where his owner is waiting for him.

Control Sheme

Rio's  (players) movement:

Use LEFT, UP, DOWN and RIGHT arrows or A, W, S,D  to move.

Use SPACE to jump.

Use SHIFT to run.

Tip : Press 2 to constant run
